step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Try to keep your hands gently on your abdomen.
You're doing well placing your hands on your abdomen. Focus on a slow inhale through your nose.
Great job inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Visualize fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent work exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with this deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body, then exhale through your mouth while relaxing. Keep up the good work to help your lymphatic system.
